name: Hellish Battle
description:
Welcome in Hellish Battle - 2.5D Retro FPS

Hellish Battle is a renewed version of the Game with the same title created by a 13-year-old boy who was just starting his adventure with programming and after 5 years he decided to renew his idea.

Version 1.1.0a（current）

Released: May 17, 2022

- Weapon Animation

- New Weapon Mode: Automatic, Aim

- Enemy AI [Alert, Attack, Chase, Patrol]

- Danger Zone

- Explosion Barrel

- Change Fov

- Pause Screen

- 80+ Level Texture

- Bug Fixes and More...

Version 1.0.0a

Released: Apr 22, 2022

- Movement System

- Health & Armor System

- 2 Weapon Type (Hitscan & Projectile)

- Ammo Pools & Pick-Up Bonus

- 4  Weapon (Pistol, Infinity Pistol, Grenade Lancher, Rocket Lancher)

- Simple Door 

- Dummy Enemy

- 50+ Level Texture
